name: Guadalupe Nash
text: Ahhhh, I miss Dolphin Cruise Aboard Dolphin Tales. Prime people watching spot in a great little park. Love grabbing an iced coffee and venturing over here to chill out for a little while. There are tons of dogs running around, families, lots of variety with excellent views. One thing to note, for people coming here for the first time is that there's generally A LOT of weed around. Maybe make a friend and partake - who knows? Definitely love this spot.

name: Ice Dog
text: Fun time.   5pm cruise.    Lots of dolphins.   Everyone onBoard seem to have a lot of fun.   Super nice and friendly people operating the cruise.  Would do it again and highly recommend.

name: Danny Embry
text: Incredible morning dolphin watching and cruising the bayou. Had a great time with Tabby and Capt. Bart.

name: Katie Eickman
text: This cruise was awesome! We saw lots of dolphins, the people running it we're interactive, fun, great with involving kids and informative. It was so relaxing. I would definitely go again. It made my son's year! :)

name: Alisha Wheat
text: We called the day of and was able to get a snorkeling cruise.  The lady that answered the phone was so sweet!  On the cruise the Captain was very cool and answered all our questions.  Great price and very friendly!!

resp.text: Alisha, thank you for the kind words and the awesome 5 star review! These reviews encourage us so much. You are like the cheering squad that keeps us going. We sure appreciate you taking your time to leave this review and we hope to see you again aboard Dolphin Tales! Happy Blessings to you and your family until then.

name: Chris Pittson
text: We enjoyed the 5pm sunset dolphin cruise. Nice modern boat.  Only takes 24 passengers. It has room for more so it wasn't crowded.  Captain was super nice and informative. Saw plenty of dolphins which was the point. Excellent!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We enjoyed having you! So glad you enjoyed your cruise!!

name: Yareli Tena
text: We had a an absolute amazing time. The staff was friendly and even offered directions by text. The captain allowed our kids to steer the boat and we saw the dolphins for a generous time.

name: Kyle Knell (Kyle Von Clausewitz)
text: Our cruise started slow, but ended with lots of dolphin the closer we got to sunset. We had 9 people, ages 11 & up and everyone was entertained.  Captain Bart and Tammy were friendly and interactive and it was a great bargain.  They definitely made our day.  Bring some money for a tip. :)

resp.text:
Kyle, Thank you so much fun the 5 star review! Capt. Bart & I do our best to provide you with a fun and informative cruise. It’s so kind of you to remind others to bring tip money, and we do appreciate the gratuity.
Please come back to cruise with us again and try a Blue Angels or a Snorkel excursion, or just another dolphin cruise- as every cruise every day is totally different. We spot different dolphin on different days. 🐬 My southern accent must have been extra thick that day. We don’t have a deck hand named Tammy, but we do have me- I am Tabby and I appreciate you taking the time to give us a good review.

Until we meet again, kind regards,

Tabby & Capt. Bart

name: Carolyn Park
text: Best dolphin experience ever! Lots of dolphins, great guide with time and attention given to detailing interest of passengers. We saw shrimp fishermen casting nets and plenty of dolphins feeding, while birds and pelicans flocked alongside. Mid tour we enjoyed the fireworks and yacht lights at The Wharf at the intracoastal waterway. My family loved every minute. Family operated and well maintained.

name: Ryan Hall
text: We had a great time on the early morning dolphin cruise. The captain and his wife were VERY knowledgeable about the habits and life of the dolphins. They even had names for some of them! Answered all of our questions about the dolphins and shrimp boats. They had a life vest for my 2 year old and snacks and drinks for sale on board. I really liked how they are a family business and you can't beat the price! I highly recommend this cruise for young families looking for a fun local activity

name: Lorri Rhodes
text: 2 trips & LOVED both! One with my 3 year old and he and I both LOVED it! They even let him think he was driving the boat, which was a huge hit. Then I went during the Winter with a group of Winter Guests. We saw a few dolphin that time of year even though it was pretty cold. Plus we saw Pelicans diving for bait and deer on the back bay. Great outdoor experience for all ages!

name: Louise Whitney
text:
We had the most amazing afternoon aboard Dolphin Tales. We enjoyed a mid-day cruise on this comfortable boat. It was chilly, and they even offered us blankets & they have these nifty roll down clear curtains that totally block the chilly air. I don't know how anyone rides on one of the open boats during the spring. This ride was much more enjoyable than others I've been on while vacationing here.
This is the best cruise in town!

name: Betty Meeks
text:
This is the best dolphin cruise I've taken.
The boat is so comfortable & relaxing.
Nice cool ride with a top over the whole boat.
I'm a senior citizen & I appreciate the easy on/off accessibility of the boat. The bathroom on board is a nice amenity too.

name: Dan Valcarcel
text: Great fun and worth every penny! We saw dolphins, yes, but more than that enjoyed a magical time in the boat. Super friendly pilot...great with the kids. He even went back to fish out my son's shoe that fell in the water. A great highlight of our stay in Orange Beach. Highly recommended.

name: S Klasing
text: What an experience! We loved it! Please take cash aboard to tip your captain. ( I had no idea about tipping and felt like a butt when everyone tipped at the end of the cruise).. He's great and doesn't worry about going a little over the time limit to ensure you have the best time possible.. ( Or maybe we just got lucky being the last crew of the day). A must do!!!!

name: Billy King
text: Great time with our family of 6. Saw many dolphins. Was able to take our own cooler and snacks.  Entire trip was 1.5 to 2 hrs.  Bart was very friendly and knowledgeable.  Will use them again!!

name: Paula Grimes
text: My family came to Gulf Shores from Kentucky last year and we took the dolphin tales cruise and loved it! This year we came back and haven taken two cruises with them. They are very friendly and we always see dolphins. We enjoy the cruise very much!!

name: Apolinario Casarez
text: Awesome dolphin sighting trip. Very friendly captain and crew. Our trip went a little longer than two hours due to being determined to see dolphins. When we finally saw some we saw many. Great tour and will return.

name: Tabitha Bowers
text:
HOME OF THE $10 DOLPHIN CRUISE!!!!! FAMILY FRIENDLY PRICES. SHADED BOAT. BATHROOM ON BOARD. PADDED SEATS. GREAT CAPTAIN AND STAFF!
A PERFECT CRUISE WITHOUT BREAKING THE BANK.

name: Erin Breuker
text: What a fun tour! Laid back and casual, we were allowed to keep our shoes on! Captain Bart and Tabi were kind and accommodating as well as knowledgeable. Can't be the price and the experience was great. Saw plenty of Dolphins and Dolphin Tales are respectful to the Dolphins. Strongly recommend!

name: Wes Singleton
text: My Wife and I had a great time, and saw many dolphins on our sunset cruise.  Captain Bart and his wife Tabitha were very kind and welcoming.  I was looking for a less crowded, smaller boat, and this fit the bill.

name: Hank Mastalerz
text: Turned out to be a great trip with a lot of great dolphins along the entire way. The crew was very nice and made the experience great, especially with the knowledge and insights they shared. Definitely recommend for anyone for a great morning or afternoon.

name: Faye Pendergrass
text: On a recent girls trip to the beach we chose to take the Dolphin Tales Cruise.  It was the highlight of the trip.  The boat was great and comfortable.  We felt so "at home" with the crew and their attention to detail.  Hope to go again when we get back to the area.

name: Amanda Beavers
text: Our family had a blast yesterday on the 5:30 Dolphin Tale cruise! We saw A LOT of dolphin's & made some beautiful pictures! Captain Bart & Mrs.Tabitha were wonderful!!!! Thank you both for an amazing experience!

name: Ricky Johnson
text: Great experience! Nice that it was a husband /wife team.  Made it more personal.  We got to see plenty of Dolphins.  Not a bad view on the boat,  with great comfortable seats with plenty of space to roam the boat.

name: DeSoto's Restaurant
text: We have had a wonderful time while dolphin cruising with Dolphin Tales. It is a great boat run by nice people. They will even book private excursions. The sunset cruise was amazing.

name: Jeri Ann
text: The boat was great!  There isn't a bad seat and the canopy keeps you protected from the sun.  They also circle around the dolphins so everyone gets a good look.  You definitely can't beat the Monday Madness price!!!  It's a must see!

name: Ricky Johnson
text: Great experience! Nice that it was a husband /wife team.  Made it more personal.  We got to see plenty of Dolphins.  Not a bad view on the boat,  with great comfortable seats with plenty of space to roam the boat.

name: Jeri Ann
text: The boat was great!  There isn't a bad seat and the canopy keeps you protected from the sun.  They also circle around the dolphins so everyone gets a good look.  You definitely can't beat the Monday Madness price!!!  It's a must see!

name: Christine McFarling
text: I went with my grand children and we loved it. The have snacks for sale and they know a lot about the animals. We will be coming back!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for such a kind review. Your review of what we do daily is precise, true and correct.

Best Regards

Tabby & Capt. Bart

name: christy Daniel
text: This was a great trip and the people are very friendly.  It's the best dolphin cruise in Orange Beach.  We've been on several and we will definitely come back to Dolphin Tales.

name: Stephen Hayden
text: A great deal and such nice owners! We had a blast on this tour. We saw many dolphins too!

name: Zach Wagner
text: We tried to book the cruise for the day we wanted and everything was fine until the receipt printed and showed a date more than a week away. We called the company to find out how we could book the trip for another day or what our options were and all we got were rude, snide remarks from the owner saying that "It was your fault because the computer always asks what day you want." The only solution was to process a refund and charge a 20% fee due to their error. You would think that when you work in the tourism industry, your customer service would be a little better.

resp.text:
Hi Zach,
I checked my manifest and don’t have a customer in the history of 4 years worth of manifest since the inception of this business with a first or last name matching the name you used here. I am sorry for what you endured and there is a company in town using a very similar name as mine.
I wish you well.
One thing I am not is”rude”, so I am very confident you did not speak to me.
Hope you are having a better day.

Best wishes,

Tabby

name: Deena Powell
text: Awesome tour. Very friendly staff. We highly recommend.  We started seeing dolphins shortly after we left dock and continued seeing them throughout the trip.

name: Tori Navigator
text:
We cruised last weekend and had a blast!
Dolphin Crusing for $10 cannot be beat!
We prefer the Dolphin Tales boat and can't wait to come later in the summer and go out on the smaller boat.
Captain Bart & Tab always give a 5 star experience.

name: Brianna Edler
text: One star is being considerate. Back in August we tried to take the Dolphin Tales sunset cruise. There was 14 of us, who drove an hour out for the cruise. We were told to arrive at 5:30 to board at 6 for our sunset dolphin cruise from 6-8pm. After 6:00 came and went we were wondering where the boat was. No communication from the company. After posting a review saying they were a no show and we were disappointed, they contacted us and said there was an emergency in the family. They said if we REMOVED our post we would be given 6 certificates. We removed the post. This week we tried to book our makeup trip for tonight (Sunday Feb 18th) we were told to be at a different place at 2:30 for our 3-5 sunset cruise. We arrive at 2:45 (we took 4 cars all driving an hour away). Again. No boat. We call the company and they said they already left, they left at 230 for the 3pm cruise.

name: Ashley Yanosky
text: Lovely dolphin tour hosted by a husband and wife team with true southern hospitality. Family and budget friendly. We will definitely be back.

name: Brian Harvey
text: Family friendly, very accommodating, reasonable prices.  Went with 4 kids five and under, they had a blast.  Captain Bart even let them drive.  Definitely would go again.

name: Kasey Blanks
text: We took our 3 yr old son it was nice friendly people it was Monday they off a good deal made reservations thru the Facebook page that linked me the there page. Easy to find it was rainy but they boat ride was nice and we seen dolphins! Comfortable seating and the boat had a roof! I definitely recommend going.

name: Valerie Smyder
text: Warm & welcoming husband & wife team. Byob, no restrictions on alcohol. Toilet on boat, mostly shaded! Especially loved their eco-friendly, dolphin-friendly approach... we saw a lot of beautiful & natural dolphin activity without inciting unnecessary (& sometimes dangerous) thrill-seeking behavior from the dolphins. Hosts were full of information about dolphins, other creatures & local sites.

name: Timothy Gardner
text: If I could give 6 stars I would! We made a mistake and went to Orange Beach to the wrong company. Made contact with them and they said they would wait. We had no time to spare to make it to Perdido Key, FL. We showed up 15 minutes after the scheduled cruise was supposed to start. They went out of there way to come pick us up at the dock. Welcomed us onboard and we had a great time. Very informative crew! We loved it!

name: Christopher Newton
text: Do not recommend, bad customer service, no one can give you a straight answer, the staff were rude, the area and boat was dirty. Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

name: Kevin Mccarty
text: My family had an amazing time! The kids loved how close we were able to get to the dolphins. I'll ve uding thrm again!

name: Ericka Wheeler
text: This tour was the most memorable part of our trip to orange beach this summer! Loved the island, the ride, and of course the dolphins! I'm not sure who had more fun, the kids or adults ;-)

name: Charlie Wilson
text: This is a great cruise!!!  The Dolphins came right up to our boat and it was so cool!  Definitely choose this one!

name: Joe Cerven
text: Excellent way to spend an afternoon.  Numerous sightings and smooth ride despite windy/choppy conditions.  Great hospitality as well!

name: Dialyn Powers
text: I know you have a lot of choices but the smart one is this dolphin cruise. My friends and I never stopped laughing. Make sure you add it to you To Do list. I swear the owner must be a dolphin whisper.

name: Independent Posts
text: An unforgettable experience on the Dolphin cruise! Lovely crew, too! Strongly recommend!

name: Cat Huss
text: Great trip. Friendly people. LOADS of dolphins!!! Super trip. We plan to book again soon!!

name: Errol Jones
text: They had rescheduled us on a different time slot the day before and I did not get the text until an hour before the cruise. They would not provide us with a refund. After standing in the hot sun for over an hour they offered us a ride on a sail boat without any shade. The kids would have been toasted. What ever happened to customer service? The lady on the phone was loud and rude!

name: Desiree Johnson
text: Shaded with padded seats. Very family friendly! Had a great time!

name: karen wilder
text:
Bored, idled  forever, no information about dolphins or area, no music, deck of boat was dirty, no laughs, peoples kids got bored and fussy, worse dolphins  cruise I have ever been on, even the captain looked untrue sky
They dont even check for payment!
Pay a few bucks more for alot more fun!!

resp.text:
Karen,
I checked my manifest for 37 weeks ago, and even went back 4 years, and could not find your name. I have no clue which boat you actually cruised on, but I believe you were on another boat.
My mother (aka my best friend/right arm) died last season and two weeks later, I was back on the water, trying to give my customers a great dolphin experience. There has never been a day that we don’t bring forth our “A” game, and put aside any personal issues we might have- including the death of a loved one.
I’m sorry for what you went through on someone’s boat, but I am confident it wasn’t mine.
And as far as checking for payment....if you cruised with someone without paying...shame on you.
We all (all dolphin cruises) work very hard and occasionally, due to most customers paying online prior to the cruise, and no need to “check for payment”, we/any cruise company miss collecting and if you did not speak up, SHAME one you. What are you trying to accomplish by announcing that on a public forum?
Are you encouraging others to stiff us too? Wow. That speaks volumes.
P.S.
There is another company in town who copied my business model, and had a very similar name as me. Perhaps you cruised with them.
Either way, I hope you find what you’re looking for in life, because it’s pretty sad to leave a small business such a stinking review.

Kind Regards

Tabby

The dinosaurs are spread out, you'll see an off road path along the road side...they're along that path and BamaHenge is at the beginning as you come in. You can park there and walk or drive along the dinosaurs path.

name: Chris Stinson
text: Great place to take kids! There is a little bit of walking in between each spot but it is not bad. There are a total of 5 locations along the main road. Stonehenge, T-Rex, triceratops and stegosaurus are all on the right as you enter the marina. On the left just past the stegosaurus, there is another dinosaur back in the trees but we did not see that one until we were back in our car. At the marina there are also statues at a fountain and a giant spider. Out in the water is another statue.

Some of the dinosaurs could use a little TLC.

We love odd attractions that are unique to the area and this fits the bill!  We just appreciate that they were there, that we found them, and that we had decent weather to have an adventure in the afternoon.

For more fun stuff wherever you are, check out roadsideamerica. com.

name: Josh Bradford
text: Wonderful!  It's FREE, people.  A labor of love. It's not an "attraction" like a museum or a paid park...it's a few dinosaurs, bamahenge, the enormous spider, the lady in the lake (mostly fiberglass) that appear as you ride to the marina. Yes, they are off the road, it isn't a "formal place". And yes, there are mosquitos (it's the south, near the water)...it's also HOT and since the dinosaurs are in the woods, there are things like spiders, snakes, and things you should watch for...though VISITORS are worse than wildlife.  I wish people knew not to climb on the structures, & how to be RESPECTFUL. I wish visitors knew how to keep this awesome place for all to enjoy.  It's too great to be destroyed just for your selfie & your kid ain't that cute to be climbing on the Dino's! You can take pictures BESIDE not on top of Dino's!  The brontosaurus is on the other side of the road from the Stego. & Triceratops. The t-rex is kinda hidden too but you should be able to spot a trail. Looking for them is the FUN OF IT...they are wonderful creations that are meant to surprise you by being there.  Bamahenge has been paint-balled by heathens with no respect for others! This site is so amazing, I wish visitors could appreciate it without destroying it.

Marvelous cemetery and park.  I fell in love with this park.  It's amazing, celebrating the lives of our Confederate Soldiers.  Shame on VA for not recognizing them.  Learned allot of history in short amount of time just waking, reading, and googling names/dates.
Will definitely be back.

name: Strange and Unusual Paranormal
text: Gps took us right to it! Although the park closes at sun down it's one creepy spot! Our K2 Meter and rem pod went nuts! Caught some great footage and pics! Recommend this hot spot of Paranormal to everyone!

text: Still one of our favorite little hidden playgrounds in Huntsville. Kids tend to ignore the swings & head for the rock walls. Makes for a peaceful little adventure.

name: Debra Carter
text: Very nice old historic park with lots of neat rock formations since it was an old quarry. Too bad the old equipment was ripped out but at least they put something back in for the families that go there. There are a lot of really old stories about this little park just go and see for yourself its a really neat and beautiful park regardless of whether you believe or not things happen really late when park is closed anyway. They do have a ghost tour and the Maple Hill Cemetery stroll if you want to hear the history of this historic cemetery.

name: Margie Gilbert
text: We came by this park on our way home from Nashville.. Of course we had heard that it was haunted and we wanted to see for ourselves.  It is in a residential area and the area around the park had a little bit of construction going on with it.  We didn't see any restrooms while there and had to go back to Hardee's a mile or so away (which was disgusting).  The park is peaceful and while I didn't see or hear anything out of the ordinary I absolutely recommend a stop here!

Most were intentional shots and videos of the swings and background that just aren't there. We make a nice day of it by stoping by ROCKET CITY on the way back.. text: It is nice during the daytime. They added some new playground equipment recently. Pretty rock bluffs around the playground area. It is frequented by drug users and teens goofing off after sundown. Often referred to as Dead Children's Playground based on urban legends of things that happen here after dark.

Ok, so we were on a ghost app and it said
'mary" and we were like oh yeah ahahahaha but later on we were researching this place and turns out that the oldest intact grave here is an infant named mary. That might also explain why only the baby swing was moving. And also my friend got some random text from somebody named mary while we were there so... just a very creepy place.....

resp.text: Wonderful! We are always happy to hear from visitors to the TVMA - but YOUNG visitors especially hold a place in our hearts. We can't wait to see you again!!

name: Sara Pack
text: Don't be like me and neglect going to this great local museum of art for far too long! Go often. There's a free afternoon every week, but it's worth the fee to practically have the place to yourself on a slow day. I was blessed with the opportunity to see the members collection this year (2019).

resp.text: Sara, thank you so much for your review! We're delighted you came by to see the exhibit - we'll hope to see you back for Spruce Pine Pottery this autumn!

name: George Lair
text: Dick Cooper's exhibit of picture taken at Muscle Shoals Sound Studios was fantastic. I'm always impressed with the exhibits featured at the museum.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We had a great time getting a look at some local music history!!

name: FBF Family
text: Beautiful pieces and well displayed.

name: Nicole Hughes
text:
I've often wondered about this jewel hidden in the Heart of Dixie. I've passed it by one million times over it seems and I've yet to enter. It's still a mystery that is only a stone's throw away from my home.
I'm an artistic person by nature (even if I'm not very good at it) and Therein lies the mystery. I live and love everything art. Books, paintings, sculptures, nature itself and probably the most heaping helping of music you can imagine. I don't ever hardly watch television. I don't have cable, satellite, etc  And I don't want to. I never watch. If I do sit down and watch a movie I rarely get quiet enough to get it all in. I've only recently got Netflix on my phone as a gift from a concerned friend who thought I should get a Dr exam and thourogh check-up since I don't know which Kardashian is which or why it is important. LOL as we all say and I'm on a mission to enter this place this coming week and I will solve this mystery and make sure that you are super informed.
I'm excited.

resp.text: We're so glad to hear from you! We're open Monday-Friday 9-5, and (during exhibits) you can catch us Sundays 1-3. Come by and say hello - we'd love to show you around!

name: Allen Parsons
text: Okay, maybe not the greatest museum on the planet, but give the plucky institution credit for spirit and enhancing the cultural richness of the Shoals. The rotating exhibits support Southern arts. The permanent petroglyph exhibit of prehistorically carved stone reminds the viewer of a long-ago world. Give it 20 to 30 minutes and you've more than covered its offerings. Helen Keller birth place is a chip shot away.

name: LJ Pack
text: Nice local art museum

resp.text: Thank you! We hope you enjoyed the Spruce Pine Pottery exhibit. We hope you'll stop by to check out our next exhibit - a three-days-only survey of Dick Cooper's photography, Nov. 14th-16th!!

text: Great service and a very special place!

text: Family atmosphere.

name: Patricia Ortuno
text: Just too hot right now

name: Sheila Danhoff
text: We attended Brandon's magic show while we were visiting Gulf Shores for vacation.  It was a great break from all the outdoor activities.  And what a great show!  Brandon is a great entertainer and we are still trying to figure out how he pulled off some of his tricks!  Loved seeing his family at the end!

resp.text: Sheila, thank you for attending the magic show during your vacation and for your detailed review, it means a lot to us!

name: Derrick Piper
text: So much fun! Brandon is witty, funny, changes seamlessly between impersonations, and delivers punch lines on point! I can't believe how much fun this was and so cheap for the value! They let you bring in outside alcohol from other OWA vendors. They sell soda and snacks reasonably priced. Its a small theater so get tickets early, we definitely will be going back for the other shows he performs!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! I give you 5 stars for your laugh! :) We look forward to seeing you again next time!

name: Keith Ludwig
text: Awesome show!  Many impersonations were spot on and Brandon added his own quirks and humor to make them that much more enjoyable.  After the show he posed for pictures, chatted and gave a few magic tips also. Venue was very small, not a bad seat in the theater.

resp.text: Thank you for your thoughtful and detailed review, we're so glad you enjoyed the variety show and we hope you can come back to see another show sometime :)

name: Jeanette Clemens
text: We took mom to the Brandon Styles impressionist show and we were super impressed. Pun intended. You not the only one with jokes, Brandon.  We had a great time and were entertained from start to finish. We'll definitely go back for the magic show.

resp.text: Hey Jeanette, thank you for bringing your mom to the variety show and we're super happy you all had a great time. See you next time when you come back for the magic show, you better have some jokes for us!

name: Ray Lemon
text:
It's great to see such quality entertainment in this area. A nice family friendly show in a small, personal theater setting. Brandon could certainly hold his own in a much larger venue, but he chooses to do this to stay close to his family.
Dinner at Paula Dean's Restaurant and a Vegas  Style lounge variety show, equals a great "Date Night" and it's less than an hour from Pensacola or Mobile and quite affordable.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and great detailed review! We appreciate it :)

name: Candace Phillips
text: This show was great. My husband and I were so glad this was what we chose to do on a Saturday night. Most of the show was right up our alley but there was about 10 minutes or so at the end that we were wondering what happened. It was almost like he changed his target audience. I still wouldn’t have missed this. Excellent impersonating and great interaction with audience. Definitely dragging my teens to see the show soon.

resp.text: Candace, we're so glad you came to see the variety show and we look forward to having you and the teens back! :)

name: Tbaucom55@gmail.com Nana55
text: Enjoyable entertainment!  If your in Foley/Gulf Shores schedule this show.  Brandon Styles is a good entertainer, worth the money!

resp.text: Well thank you very much for the great feedback. We're glad you had a great time

name: Teri Reynolds
text: We took our kids and grandkids to the show this week. We all had a great time. The show is full of laughter and fun, and is great for all ages. Our grandson got up on stage, and got a big surprise, but I won't spoil it here. Reasonably priced for a fun night out!

resp.text: Teri, thank you for the 5 stars and bringing your grandson to the magic show! That surprise is one of our favorite parts of the show too, hahaa!!

name: Kendra Krout
text: We had a party of 6 for the show on Saturday. We honestly had no idea what to expect. We had the best time and laughed soooo much. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Hey Kendra, we're so glad you booked tickets to see the show and that you had a blast! See you next time :)

name: Sandy Shea
text: We saw the variety show Saturday night at OWA and were pleasantly surprised at how good it was.  Would love to see it again with friends! We are recommending this show to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to having you back for another show! :)

name: Summer McDade
text: IF YOU GET THE CHANCE TO GO, DEFINITELY GO! We have two kids (10,4 + boy, girl) They absolutely loved it. Us adults had a blast too! It was worth every penny and super inclusive. Everybody was so nice and welcoming and the show was AMAZING! We haven’t ever been to a magic show but my son loves it so we went and it did not disappoint. Brandon easily keeps you engaged and interacts freely with the audience. It truly was more than we anticipated and that’s a great thing.

resp.text: THANK YOU for such a wonderful review, it means a lot to us! We are so glad you got to see our Magic Show and that everyone loved it!

name: Cecil Perry
text: We are regular attendees to all of Brandon's shows.  He is a great entertainer and his 2021 variety show, if possible, is even better than the one in 2020.  Be sure and get the VIP option.  His up close and personal magic is amazing and if you're lucky, he may show you how he does one or two of his tricks, but not all of them!

resp.text: You guys rock! We love seeing you at like EVERY event! Thank you for your support, we're happy you have such a good time that you keep coming back :)

name: Miguel Knuckey
text: Brandon brings Great humor and impressions of the best artists known, his ability to keep the momentum of engagement is far beyond I’ve experienced coming from the stage of musical comedy. Will definitely return.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and positive review! Look forward to seeing you next time :)

name: miller malice
text: We absolutely loved this show… Family friendly, up beat and exciting.., kept audience involved… will be back!!!!! Y’all go see it

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming to the Variety Show! We look forward to having you back for another show! :)

name: Amber Merrell
text: Took the family for the variety show on April 24th.  Brandon's impressions were funny.  The kids did not get into it as much not knowing the different artist but the few magic tricks he did throughout the show were fun.  I would suggest  this for adults but look forward to taking our boys to his magic show later on this year.

resp.text: Thank you! I'm so glad that overall you had a great time and will be coming back for the Magic Show. I promise the kids will LOVE it and so will the adults :)

name: Michael Scarbrough
text: My family and I saw the variety show. We absolutely loved it, I would highly recommend it. Cannot wait to see the magic show.

resp.text: Michael, thank you for the 5 star review and we love to hear your experience. Look forward to seeing you when you come back for the magic show!!

name: Jonathan Bennett
text: If your looking for entertainment, this guy is the best.  We had a great time with our whole family.  They are a family run business but literally the best in the world.  Brandon has placed top in the world and he is a true entertainer/magician/vocalist, true talent.

resp.text: Oh Jon, thank you for bringing your family to Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show (and all of our other shows). Thank you so much for your support and for your kind words!

name: Lisa Wiggins
text: The show was great! We carried 4 of our grandchildren & they absolutely LOVED it! Beginning to end was funny & very entertaining. Brandon is a very talented magician.

resp.text: Lisa, thank you so much for bringing your family to our magic show last night! We hope to see you next time you're on vacation :)

name: Donald Creppel
text: Enjoyed Brandon's Variety Show is was fun for all ages. Went with my wife and friends and done the VIP and Brandon showed us some close up slight of hand tricks. If you down on Alabama Gulf Coast and want something to take the whole family, come see Brandon Styles at OWA.

resp.text: Hey Donald, thank you for the awesome review and kind words! So glad you choose VIP, what a fun time it was :)

name: Michael Foster
text: This show had the entire audience laughing. I would say the show is equal parts magic, and comedy. Brandon is a goofball throughout, and he often solicits audience participation. I only wish the show was longer.

resp.text: Hey Michael, Thank you for coming to see the Comedy Magic Show, for your great review and kind words! We hope you get the chance to come back and see the Variety Show too :)

name: Joanna Saucier
text: What an amazing show! Brandon is extremely talented, entertaining & puts on a great show. Can’t wait to go back to see again.

resp.text: Hey Joanna, thank you for your positive review, we're glad you loved the Variety Show! See you again next time :)

name: Steven Walling
text: We have been to 3 shows at Brandon's theatre. He is always funny, entertaining, and involving the audience to interact. Highly recommend his variety show as well as his magic show. Good Times!!

resp.text: Thank you for your support, we're thankful you are enjoying the shows we produce at our theater! See you again :)

name: Linda Lucas
text: We truly enjoyed the show. Brandon performed a wide range of music so everyone was able to hear a favorite. Also the food was good and all of the staff were professional and friendly. I highly recommend going to this show. You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Hey Linda, thank you so much for attending Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show and for your kind words! We're glad you enjoyed yourself!

resp.text: Awe, thank you for the kind words and feedback! See you next time :)

resp.text: I'm glad you came to one of our special events and had a great time. Hope to have the back for our other shows!

resp.text: Thank you for bringing the family to the COMEDY MAGIC SHOW!! Glad you all had a good time :)

text: Came to Brandon's  variety show when we were on vacation and it was awesome.  He does great on the impressions,  comedy, and dance.  I  absolutely love to dance so any thing with music and dance is spot on for me. We came back a few nights later for the magic show and it was good as well but my favorite is the  variety  show.   Good job Brandon.  I  recommend  seeing the show  when you are in the area.

resp.text: Thank you for seeing and recommending both the Magic Show and Variety Show while you were on vacation!

name: Raley & Tenley Mc
text: Great show!  Unexpected and the high light of our spring break trip! I would highly recommend his shows for any age, prepare to laugh the entire time!

resp.text: Awesome! We're so happy you came to our show during your spring break vacation and that it was a highlight!! That means a lot, thanks!

Before our night came to an end we payed a visit to the magic shop. The thumb lights are still a huge hit in our home. Thank you so much for entertaining us on our Date-Night!!

resp.text: Heather, thank you for spending date night at our show and for your kind words! Keep your magic up and we look forward to having you back!

name: Pat Coffin

resp.text: Hey Pat, thank you for coming to see the Variety Show! We're glad you had a great time with us :)

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming to the Variety Show and leaving a 5 star review!

name: Cyndi G.
text: Brandon's performance was hilarious and gifted. He kept me on the edge of my seat 🤣😂 with laughter. I love the impressions and magic.  He has mad skills. My entire group of six enjoyed it in its entirety. I love the fact that he and his wife  work so well together to bring great entertainment.  We are going back in three days for another show.  Yay!🙌🏽

resp.text: We're so glad you had a fantastic time at the Variety Show, so much that you came back a few days later to watch the Magic Show too! Thank you for the support, our family works hard to make sure you have a good time so thank you for noticing :)

name: MICHELLEG
text: The show was great!  Brandon Styles has a great voice and is halarious!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: JoAnn Malmberg
text: We thoroughly, thoroughly enjoyed  this performance. Amazed at his talent. Highly recommend seeing Brandon perform.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to see the last Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show for this year! We rocked out. I hope you get the chance to see our other shows that run the rest of the year.

name: Brittany Etheridge
text: Seriously one of the best nights ever! Brandon is so talented. The kids (ages 7, 4, 3 and 0) were entertained the entire show. It was absolutely hilarious. Perfect for family night, date night, any night. Would go.... Will go over and over!

resp.text: We're so glad your family had a great time at Brandon Styles Variety Show and We can't wait to see you again!

name: Tammy Conway
text: This Show is the most Awesome,  I love the jokes and the singing in different voices. I have been several times and we are planning to go to the upcoming dinner show in January or February,  To know that his Family all contributes to the running of the show is wonderful and makes you want to support them even more, Thank you for a great show.. Definitely recommend.....

resp.text: Tammy, THANK YOU for being a FAN and always coming to see our shows, your support means a lot to us! We look forward to seeing you again this winter!

name: Lisa Durham
text: The best hour of fun in the area! I live in Gulf Shores and have seen BS several times. My favorite parts of the show - the presidents doing magic, the short magic show in the middle, how he nails unique voices like Aaron Neville and Satchmo, Obama rapping, and the dancing. But, the whole show is fun and very entertaining! Brandon and Diamond produce a lively, delightful time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful detailed review and coming to see our shows over and over! It really means a lot to us!

name: Scott Pickett
text: We really enjoyed our night at the Brandon Styles magic show. My son even got onstage and was part of the act! I highly recommend this show to anyone in the Gulf Shores area!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving this wonderful review! It means a lot to us! We are so glad you had a great time :)

name: Missy Tyler
text: Best Date Night!!! John and I were thoroughly entertained by another fantastic show by Brandon Styles:). We laughed so hard, and were again amazed by Brandon’s talent, creativity, and energy. Best of all, you can tell Brandon is enjoying himself as much as his guests are. This was the 5th time we have seen him (he has a variety of shows). It’s always a good time. Having Brandon Styles on Alabama’s Gulf Coast is such a gift. We highly recommend his shows to the guests who stay in our vacation rental. Good times!

resp.text: This means so much to us! Thank you for your continued support and allowing us to entertain you OVER & OVER! ♥♥♥

name: Kathy Guerrero
text: His show is awesome had us laughing the whole time wish it was longer

resp.text: So glad you were laughing the whole time. I sometimes wish it was longer too but it's exhausting acting that "crazy" on stage lol

name: C Berk
text: So much fun!  Two adults (late 30s, early 40s) and 3 kids (9, 11, 14) attended and we all had fun.  Great mixture of impressions and magic and dancing - super fun!  We ALL laughed so hard.  The two youngest didn’t know many of the songs but they still enjoyed his energy and the magic tricks.  We would recommend this show for all ages!  So glad we booked this show and would go to another one in a heartbeat if we had more time.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing the family to the Variety Show! I'm so happy that everyone had a good time!

name: Melissa Chisolm
text: This was such a great time! We had a lot of fun and Brandon was so interactive with us adults and our kid!

resp.text: Thank you for bringing your family to the Private Close-Up Magic Show! We're glad everyone had a great time :)

name: Lorri McDaniel
text: The show was great. The only complaint is the drunk on the 2nd row vomiting and ruining the atmosphere.

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed GULF COAST COMEDY FEST - STAND UP COMEDY NIGHT! I'm so sorry that happened, it definitely was a first and hopefully last. We hope to see you back at one of our other shows

name: ronnie butts
text:
Great show food was great
This is a show you would not want to miss well worth the time

resp.text: Hey Ronnie, we appreciate you leaving 5 stars! We're glad you had a great time at Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show!

name: Sherri DeJong
text:
We had an absolute blast!!!! My husband an daughter were called upon stage for a magic trick. That was awesome, an the trick was awesome! Still can not figure that one out👀. Brandon an his family are genuinely sweet people, kid friendly show.
We bought VIP backstage pretty 😎 cool. Oh an I was serenaded by Elvis, and I’m all shook up!!!

resp.text:
Thank you for choosing VIP and letting Elvis serenade you BUT was it really Elvis, was it Andy Coffman or was it Brandon Styles? lol
We wish the best for your daughter as she finishes her school year!

name: Babbette Rask
text: Awesome / we look forward to seeing his other shows / he also has a lovely family❤️.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to see TRIP DOWN MEMORY LANE Dinner Show and for your kind words. We're glad you had an awesome time and look forward to having you back for another show :)

name: Monica Johnson
text: Funny, entertaining show with amazing magic tricks. Kept the audience laughing with his impersonations. Very talented entertainer. Can't wait to see the new 2021 shows!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars, it means a lot! We are glad you enjoyed the show and we look forward to having you back for Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show and 2021s NEW Variety Show!

name: Jimmey Ewing
text: We had such a good time at his show last night. He s hilarious and made us feel extremely comfortable and welcomed. I hope to be able to return and go to his show again sometime.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind remarks and for leaving 5 stars, it means a lot! We hope you get to come back and see another show again too :)

name: Kaleigh Holmes
text: Brandon...or The Great Brandini as he is sometimes referred to, is great! So many tricks that will leave you scratching your head. Pack a tissue or two because you’ll need one for sure..from laughing so hard you’ll cry! The staff is awesome, too. All around great time. Great entertainment for the entire family.

resp.text: Hahaa, Brandini is a highlight to the Magic Show, that's for sure. Thank you so much for bringing your family to our show!

name: Kim Main
text: My friend and I went to see the variety show and had a blast. Brandon is very talented and knocked it out of the park with his impersonations ! . He even goes around after the show for a meet and greet and pics if desired. Can't wait to go back and catch his magic show !

resp.text: Hey Kim, thank you <3

name: Rhonda Parker
text: A top notch show! A Las Vegas show brought to  Alabama! Brandon is very entertaining and incorporates the audience into the show which makes for one BIG happy family and show! Would definitely recommend this show to all ages! We will return Brandon! And his wife Diamond and their daughter complete their family enterprise!!! 👏👏

resp.text: Rhonda, thank you for your support and this beautiful review, it means a lot! We'll see you next time.

name: Jesse Farnsworth
text: Great show good to get out and do something different.  I was on vacation and wanted to take my kids somewhere but with the pandemic not much available.  So glad I found  this show.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We're glad you bring the family to see our show :)

name: Drew Baggett
text: Great show we took our son and he loved it as much as us! Very funny, entertaining and very good with close-up magic!!! We will be going back to see his other shows for sure

text: I really enjoyed the show!!!  Brandon is a good impressionist; very funny!  I like how it's a family affair when it comes to running the place.  Enjoyable entertainment!

name: Jean Lorance
text: Brandon is extremely talented. He has the voice, moves and even facial expressions of a wide variety of celebrities. The whole family was intrigued and entertained. Our 15 year old niece was called up to assist Brandon with one of the acts. There is no way Brandon could have known that she has had a very hard year full of endless struggles, heartbreaks and hardships. The worst of which, she has been diagnosed with an incurable kidney disease, IGA Neuropathy.  That night Brandon made her a star!!  She had a genuine smile. Thank you

resp.text: AWE! Thanks for bringing your family to Brandon Styles Variety Show. I'm honored to have had the opportunity to make her feel so special! Prayers for your niece! Come back and see us next time you come to Gulf Shores!

resp.text: I'm sorry you were disappointed but Brandon actually does introduce almost ever artist he performs. The songs he selected for this variety show were all once on the top 20 music charts, he does this so that even if you don't know the artist, more than likely you'll have heard the song. We hope you enjoyed the comedy, magic and adlib. Maybe you will enjoy another one of our shows, Trip Down Memory Lane is a dinner show with music from 1950-1970. Thank you for your feedback.

Love that the family stays together and works together, will definitely return for another show!!!  Loved his different changes in character!!!! Go Brandini 😀 God bless!

resp.text: Lydia, We're happy you liked the personal setting of the theater, the character changes and that you got to participate on stage. Thank you for this fantastic 5-STAR review, it means a lot to us and we look forward to having you back as well :)

Brandon Styles has a magnetic personality, comedy chops, and a very, very good voice, as well as quality ball-handling skills. His impressions are on point, he is sincere in his delivery and really the dude is just awesome.

Located in Owa, AL, he is building a comedy/musical/impressionist act that deserves to be in Vegas.

Or anywhere closer to my hometown so I can catch his act when I'm not on vacation.

text:
Spectacular views for a photography session or family picnic.
We took our engagement photos here and they were amazing, especially the ones we got at sunset. It’s a short drive from downtown Huntsville and you won’t be disappointed.

name: june turner
text: So very peaceful n beautiful..love walking area...no restrooms or facilities here though

name: Christo Magana
text: Nice overlook , looking out on The Tennessee River. Need I say more?

name: Jared Christian
text: Whoever's responsible for creating this public overlook - thank you!

name: Janet Dixon
text: Beautiful view. Clean place. Park benches to sit and watch the beautiful sunset. I took my mother up there yesterday. Would have been a great evening to stay and watch the gorgeous sunset, but there was a costume wedding about to start, so we didn't stick around.

name: Billy Justice
text: Made prom pictures here for my son. Very beautiful place.

name: Hiram Taylor
text: A beautiful stop over with clean bathrooms and a beautiful view. Picnic tables are available and the grass is kept mown. The Tennessee river winds through the valley below making a sparkling ribbon through the mountains and wrapping around the city of Scottsboro below. If you end up in Scottsboro, be sure to stop by Kim San restaurant,  the best Chinese in the South.

name: Shannon Sandlin
text: Beautiful view of the Tennessee River on our way to Little Canyon National Preserve from Scottsboro.

name: Debrup Bhattacharyya
text: Awesome park to watch sunset.

text: This place is wide open! Beautiful.

name: Roger Breece
text:
I have a special affinity for ASU, both my wife and son are ASU graduates, plus I was good friends with the previous ASU president and his wife due to our mutual involvement with the Athens State chapter of the Baker Street Irregulars, a Sherlock Holmes "thing" (Google Baker Street Irregulars).

ASU is Alabama's only 3-4 year University, meaning you have to be a junior by credit hours to be accepted.  ASU has been at the forefront of rolling out many of their courses onto on-line availability.  At least half of their credit hour production is now on-line.  A great option for working adults and a pretty campus with traditional architecture to the buildings.
